QuestData.Title: Rellian Greenspyre
QuestData.Description: $n, can you take one of the seeds you brought me to my friend, Rellian Greenspyre? He is a druid that resides at Wellspring Hovel, and when last we spoke he revealed his interest in my work with the Timberlings. He had some ideas himself, and he will appreciate a specimen seed to work with.$B$BThank you, $n. I hope that, some day, you will see the fruit of my labors.$B$BYou will find Wellspring Hovel along the road heading west out of Dolanaar, on the way to Darnassus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring a Timberling Seed to Rellian Greenspyre at Wellspring Hovel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello...$B$BAnd how may I help you?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, a timberling seed? I wanted to try growing one of these to help Denalan with his studies.$B$BBut I'm afraid I've discovered that a corruption has grown in many of the timberlings, and seeds from such creatures carry their parent's taint. They are beyond my talents to repair.$B$BDenalan is very skilled with things that grow. He may find a cure for future timberlings. He may be their only hope.
